message: Let's start with a fair offer, Bob. I believe this split reflects the fact that delays will hurt me more due to the higher inflation rate.
Your turn Alice. I think this is more representative of the situation we're in.
Bob, I understand your position, but your offer doesn't make sense given the rapidly increasing inflation.  Let's be reasonable, this is a fair deal.
Alice, the clock is ticking and we both lose if we don't agree soon. This is my final offer.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. A 50/50 split is the only fair option at this point. Let's not throw away all the money because of stubbornness.
